TunableList.name: SPAWN_POINT_COLORS
TunableList.description: Debug Spawn Point Color mapping. This way we can map spawn point types to colors. When the user types the |debugvis.spawn_points.start command, they will be able to see which spawn point belongs to it's appropriate color, even if the catalog side changes.

TunableEnum.name: Spawn Point Color
TunableEnum.description: The debug Color this Spawn Point will appear in the world.

Tunable.name: Spawn Point ID
Tunable.description: The ID of the Spawn Point from the Catalog under Locators.
